channel.title: A magic problem!
channel.description:
some magic help needed-
umm how do you change howmuch damage a spell does.
how do you change where you teleport when you use a teleport spell
how do you change what emote you do when you cast a spell
when you cast a spell, how do you change the spell's emote for example ice barrage is a giant chunk of ice on the person
thanks
